## Block.setHelpUrl() method

Set the URL of this block's help page.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setHelpUrl(url: string | (() => string)): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string \| (() =&gt; string) | URL string for block help, or function that returns a URL. Null for no help. |

**Returns:**

void
